courses.title: Basic Electrical Circuits
courses.description: This course covers the fundamental principles of electrical circuits, including Ohm’s Law, Kirchhoff’s Laws, and analysis of series and parallel circuits. It serves as a foundational course for all electrical engineering students.

modules.title: Module 1: Introduction to Circuits
modules.content: History of electricity, basic components, and circuit types.

modules.title: Module 2: Ohm's and Kirchhoff's Laws
modules.content: Detailed explanation and practical examples of the core laws of electricity.

modules.title: Module 3: Series and Parallel Circuits
modules.content: Analysis of different circuit configurations and their properties.

courses.title: Programming in C
courses.description: An introductory course to C programming, focusing on core concepts like data types, control structures, and functions. This course is essential for building a strong foundation in computer science.

modules.title: Module 1: Getting Started with C
modules.content: Introduction to C, compilers, and your first program.

modules.title: Module 2: Variables and Data Types
modules.content: Understanding different data types and their usage.

modules.title: Module 3: Control Structures
modules.content: Using if-else, loops, and switch statements to control program flow.

courses.title: Engineering Drawing
courses.description: Learn the principles of technical drawing, including orthographic projection and drafting standards.

modules.title: Module 1: Drawing Instruments
modules.content: Correct usage of drawing tools and instruments.

modules.title: Module 2: Geometric Constructions
modules.content: Methods for constructing various geometric shapes and figures.

modules.title: Module 3: Orthographic Projection
modules.content: Principles of representing 3D objects in 2D views.

courses.title: Digital Electronics
courses.description: This course explores the world of digital circuits, logic gates, and Boolean algebra, essential for electronics.

modules.title: Module 1: Logic Gates
modules.content: Introduction to basic logic gates (AND, OR, NOT) and their truth tables.

modules.title: Module 2: Boolean Algebra
modules.content: Simplifying digital circuits using Boolean algebra theorems.

modules.title: Module 3: Combinational Logic
modules.content: Designing and analyzing multiplexers, decoders, and encoders.

courses.title: Fluid Mechanics
courses.description: Study the properties and behavior of fluids at rest and in motion, crucial for mechanical engineering applications.

modules.title: Module 1: Fluid Properties
modules.content: Introduction to density, viscosity, and surface tension.

modules.title: Module 2: Fluid Statics
modules.content: Pressure measurement and forces on submerged surfaces.

modules.title: Module 3: Fluid Dynamics
modules.content: Principles of fluid flow and Bernoulli's equation.

courses.title: Power System Analysis
courses.description: A study of power generation, transmission, and distribution systems.

modules.title: Module 1: Generation of Power
modules.content: Types of power plants and energy sources.

modules.title: Module 2: Transmission Lines
modules.content: Analysis of transmission line parameters and performance.

modules.title: Module 3: Distribution Systems
modules.content: Types of distribution systems and voltage drop calculations.

courses.title: Web Development Basics
courses.description: Building modern web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

modules.title: Module 1: HTML Fundamentals
modules.content: Structuring web pages with semantic HTML5.

modules.title: Module 2: CSS Styling
modules.content: Designing responsive layouts with CSS3 and Tailwind.

modules.title: Module 3: JavaScript Interactivity
modules.content: Adding dynamic behavior to web pages with JavaScript.

courses.title: Construction Management
courses.description: Planning, scheduling, and managing construction projects from start to finish.

modules.title: Module 1: Project Planning
modules.content: Introduction to project lifecycle and planning tools.

modules.title: Module 2: Scheduling & Costing
modules.content: Techniques for project scheduling and cost estimation.

modules.title: Module 3: Quality Control
modules.content: Ensuring quality and safety standards on a construction site.

courses.title: Industrial Electronics
courses.description: Control of electrical power using electronic switches and devices.

modules.title: Module 1: Power Diodes
modules.content: Working principles of power diodes and their applications.

modules.title: Module 2: Thyristors and SCRs
modules.content: Characteristics and use of thyristors and SCRs.

modules.title: Module 3: Inverters and Converters
modules.content: Design and analysis of power conversion circuits.

courses.title: Refrigeration & AC
courses.description: Principles and systems of cooling, refrigeration, and climate control technologies.

modules.title: Module 1: Basics of Refrigeration
modules.content: Introduction to refrigeration cycles and components.

modules.title: Module 2: Air Conditioning Systems
modules.content: Types of AC systems and their design considerations.

modules.title: Module 3: Heat Pumps
modules.content: Understanding heat pump technology and applications.

courses.title: Urban Planning
courses.description: Designing and planning urban spaces for sustainable development and growth.

modules.title: Module 1: Urban Design Principles
modules.content: Key concepts and theories of urban design.

modules.title: Module 2: Sustainable Cities
modules.content: Methods for creating environmentally friendly urban areas.

modules.title: Module 3: Zoning and Land Use
modules.content: Understanding regulations and policies related to land use.
